name: Escape From Space Hell
description:
ESCAPE FROM SPACE HELL is a frenetic Sci-fi platformer game, that player takes the role of a scientist, who needs to escape from his spaceship and survive against an alien hive infestation.

From a first person perspective, the player must  cross different rooms of the spaceship’s separated by levels.  Player can jump in platforms, avoiding or killing aliens with special abilities and rescue survivors from the spaceship.

Each level has a time limit and the player must finish the level before the time ends. In each level the player will have some extra challenges to complete.

Controls

Movement: A,W,S,D

Sprint: Shift

Dash: Right Click Mouse
